product_overview: ZomesStay is a comprehensive travel and property booking frontend application that facilitates seamless property search, booking, and management experiences for users, travel agents, property hosts, and administrators. It integrates modern web technologies and third-party services to handle user authentication, property discovery, booking flows, payment processing, and role-specific dashboards and operations.
core_goals: Enable secure and robust multi-role user authentication for users, agents, hosts, and admins.
Provide intuitive property search, detail viewing, and robust booking flows with online payment integration.
Support travel agents and hosts with dedicated dashboards and property management capabilities.
Empower administrators with full control over properties, bookings, users, agents, inventory, and site configurations.
Ensure data consistency and good user experience through state management with Redux and smooth UI components.
Implement protected routing and role-based access control for secure resource management.
key_features: User Authentication: OTP-based for users, email/password with document verification for agents, and secure login for hosts and admins.
Property Search and Discovery: Comprehensive filtering, date and guest selectors, and detailed property listings.
Property Details and Booking Flow: Room and rate plan selection, pricing calculations, calendar integrations, and booking confirmation.
Razorpay Payment Integration: Order creation, checkout, payment status monitoring, and handling of success and failure scenarios.
User Profile and Booking Management: Viewing and editing profile data and managing user bookings and booking history.
Agent and Host Dashboards: Dedicated interfaces for travel agents and property hosts with management tools for properties, bookings, payments, promotions, and inventory.

Admin Dashboard and Management: Full CRUD for properties, bookings, users, agents; inventory, rate plans, cancellation policies; front desk operations; site configuration; and callback request management.
Reusable UI Components: Modular and consistent UI elements like cards, modals, calendars, loaders, notifications, and lists.
API Service Layer and Redux State Management: Centralized API calls with Axios and global state persistence for authentication and property data.
Static Informational Pages: Including About Us, Contact, FAQ, Legal, and agent guides.
Wishlist and Review System: Users can save favorite properties and submit ratings and reviews.
user_flow_summary: User Registration and Authentication: Users sign up or log in using phone OTP; agents, hosts, and admins authenticate via email/password with respective workflows.
Property Search to Booking: Users search properties with filters, select date ranges and guests, view details, select rooms and rate plans, make payments, and receive booking confirmation.
Agent and Host Management: Agents sign up with IATA certificate upload and await admin approval; hosts log in to manage properties, bookings, and inventory.
Admin Operations: Admins manage properties, bookings, users, agents, inventory, rate plans, cancellations, front desk functions, and site-wide configurations via the dashboard interface.
Payment Handling: Razorpay integration handles order creation, payment processing, and status polling, routing users to success or failure pages accordingly.
Protected Routes: Role-based protected routes ensure only authorized users can access specific functionalities.
validation_criteria: Successful OTP-based login and signup flows for users with correct phone verification.
Email/password authentication with validation and approval workflows for agents, hosts, and admins.
Accurate and responsive property search results based on user filters and date/guest inputs.
Correct and reliable booking flow including room selection, pricing, and payment processing through Razorpay.
Successful creation of payment orders, payment execution, and confirmation or failure handling with appropriate user feedback.
Proper data management and consistency in user profiles, bookings, properties, agents, and site configurations.
Role-based access control and route protection functioning as expected for all user types.
Performance of Redux state management including persistence across sessions for critical state slices.
Functional and intuitive UI components rendering and interaction across major user flows.
Admin and host dashboards accurately reflect real-time statistics, booking info, inventory, and configuration management.
